description: Updates a scheduled audit, including which checks are performed and how often the audit takes place. Requires permission to access the UpdateScheduledAudit action.

parameters.name: targetCheckNames
parameters.description: Which checks are performed during the scheduled audit. Checks must be enabled for your account. (Use DescribeAccountAuditConfiguration to see the list of all checks, including those that are enabled or use UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration to select which checks are enabled.) (string) --- An audit check name. (Use DescribeAccountAuditConfiguration to see the list of all checks, including those that are enabled or use UpdateAccountAuditConfiguration to select which checks are enabled.)

parameters.name: scheduledAuditName
parameters.description: The name of the scheduled audit. (Max. 128 chars)

nested_items.name: scheduledAuditArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the scheduled audit.
